transcript: This is the perfect example of making money with AI. This account is just posting these crazy cat videos and just look at the amount of views. Yes, all this viral videos and they even have 2.4 million followers. So here is how to make such videos using only one AI tool. Go to this website called nim.video and click on try for free. Now click on create. And just describe your image in simple words like an orange cat standing inside a kitchen slicing tomatoes that cat is wearing a white chef hat. Don't worry, nim AI will make the prompt better. So just choose your image model. I go with flux pro and click on generate. Here is our image and once you click on it you simply need to click on this image to video button. Choose your model from all these options. Let's use cling pro for now and click on generate. And here is our video. Ah! Ah! So if you want to try it, just comment viral AI and I will DM you the link.
